alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 21 at 6:10AM MST until October 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON SATURDAY TO 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts from 45 to 55 mph expected. Locally higher gusts are possible overnight Saturday through Sunday morning. * WHERE...Most of northern Arizona from the Yavapai county mountains and Mogollon Rim northward. * WHEN...From noon Saturday to 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains
